Package ohos.data.rdb

Class DataObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.rdb.DataObservable

  • public class DataObservable
extends Object
    Represents a set of DataObserver objects that listen for changes of the observed objects.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_APPDATAMGR

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(DataObserver dataObserver)
      Adds an observer to the observer set.
      void notifyObservers​()
      Sends a notification to all the observers in the observer set.
      void remove​(DataObserver dataObserver)
      Removes a specified observer from the observer set.
      void removeAll​()
      Removes all observers from the observer set.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(DataObserver dataObserver)
        Adds an observer to the observer set. If the observer already exists in the observer set, it will not be added.
        Parameters:
        dataObserver - data observer.

      • remove

        public void remove​(DataObserver dataObserver)
        Removes a specified observer from the observer set.
        Parameters:
        dataObserver - data observer.

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers​()
        Sends a notification to all the observers in the observer set.

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll​()
        Removes all observers from the observer set.
